title: At Davos, Musk, Others Point Out Energy as China’s Edge in the AI Race
description: The race to dominate artificial intelligence has a new—and often overlooked—frontline: electricity. At the World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland, industry and political leaders converged on one point with striking clarity: AI development at scale cannot exist without abundant, affordable power, and China has a decisive advantage. Tesla CEO Elon Musk, in his Davos debut, [...]The post At Davos, Musk, Others Point Out Energy as China’s Edge in the AI Race appeared first on Tekedia.

title: Nation's largest AI data center coming to Wyoming, raising questions about impacts
description: Earlier this month, Laramie County commissioners voted unanimously approve Project Jade, a proposal for what will be the largest AI data center in the nation.

title: Meta halts teens’ access to AI characters globally
description: Meta Platforms said on Friday it will suspend teenagers’ access to its existing AI characters across all of its apps worldwide, as it builds an updated iteration of those for teen users. “Starting in the coming weeks, teens will no longer be able to access AI characters across our apps until the updated experience is [...]
